text: "It's in the Way That You Use It" is a 1986 song by Eric Clapton and is taken from his 10th studio album August. It went to number 24 in Australia and number 77 in the United Kingdom. It was used in the 1986 movie The Color of Money. Category:1986 songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Eric Clapton songs
title: It's in the Way That You Use It
